## MarkdownBuilderOptions.content property

Markdown content to render.

**Signature:**

```typescript
content: string;
```

## Remarks

This should be a string containing valid markdown syntax. The content will be rendered with terminal styling including colors for headings, bold/italic text, code blocks, links, etc.
